document_data.name: Battle of Icewind Dale
document_data.result: Defeat of Akar Kessel, survival of [[Ten-Towns]]
document_data.commander1:
[[Bruenor Battlehammer]] (later substituted by [[Fender Mallot]])
[[Cassius]], spokesman from Bryn Shander
[[Agorwal]], spokesman from [[Termalaine]]
[[Glensather]], spokesman from [[Easthaven]]
[[Jensin Brent]], spokesman from [[Caer-Dineval]]
[[Kemp]], spokesman of [[Targos]]
[[Wulfgar]] of the [[Tribe of the Elk]]
document_data.strength1:
[[Clan Battlehammer]] [[dwarves]]
[[Ten-Towns]] soldiers
Tribe of the Elk tribesman
document_data.strength2:
Many tribes of [[orc]]s and [[goblin]]s
A number of [[ogre]]s and [[giant]]s
document_data.casualties1:
Glensather
Over half of Ten-Towns soldiers
Many tribesmen
Some dwarves
document_data.casualties2:
Akar Kessel
Many tribes of orcs and goblins
All ogres and giants
document_data.mainbody: The '''battle of Icewind Dale''' was a battle fought between the defenders of the [[Ten Towns]] in [[Icewind Dale]] and the conquering forces of [[Akar Kessell]] in the {{YearlinkName|1356}}.
